name: When you wish upon a sacrifice
name_original: When you wish upon a sacrifice
description:
This an idle game about collecting souls using the charm of your cute pet demons! 

Halloween is the perfect opportunity for you!

Summon pet demons using souls you collect from children who just can't resist coming to your house for trick or treat due to how cute your pet demons are!

Make your house as attractive as possible with your pet demons and decorations and just leave the game in the background while souls are collected!

You only have one goal, to have enough souls to summon the demon lord to grant you one wish! (Hint: It's 1,000 souls)

Short Tutorial because I can't fit in an in-game tutorial:

This is an idle game, so all you need to do is put down decorations and pets and just wait for the souls to be collected! Once you have 1,000 souls, you beat the game!

Having more pets and decorations increase the rate at which you collect souls, so put down more as you collect more!
